name: Cocktail Length - Convertible Dress
description:
Perfect for a daytime wedding, a lunch date or a day at the races! You can Wrap and twist this Cocktail Length Convertible Dress into 50 different styles - which makes them perfect for Bridesmaids of different shapes and sizes. The full circle skirt design fits every shape from the petite to the fuller figure - even Maternity. It doesn't stick to your "self-conscious bits" it simply glides off your hips. The fabric is simply divine. Containing no cheap Polyester, our dresses don't have that tacky 'swimwear' shine. They are light weight and so comfortable to wear. Our fabric breathes and flows beautifully. The entire 'Lucy and Loo' range is proudly made in Australia. Wrap your Convertible Dress into over 50 styles! Want more style options? Add some BLING and transform your look in an instant! Click Here to follow easy step by step instructions and video tutorials. Available in 16 different colours. Click here to View the Colour Range or, to Request a Fabric Sample. Available in Three sizes: Size One fits Australian 8-12 Size Two fits Australian 14-18 Size Three fits Australian 20-24 ---------------------------------------

Stock listed below is ready to be delivered!

Wedding Parties are made to order! To order a dress to be made especially for you, please CLICK HERE to contact us.

name: "Chameleon" - Convertible Dress
description:
This is by far Loo's MOST favorite piece in her wardrobe! Change your look just like a Chameleon. Wear it as a: - Maxi Skirt - High Waist Skirt - Strapless Dress - Baby Doll Strapless Dress Perfect weekend wear or glam it up with a waist belt and a pair of heels for dinner. Made from the same SUPER soft & stretchy fabric that is the signature of Lucy and Loo, this Convertible Dress/Skirt is so comfortable to wear you will want one in every colour. The stretchy fabric makes it a perfect 'non maternity' piece that you can wear now and accommodate your growing baby bump. ... trust us. You will LOVE this Convertible Skirt/Dress. Available in Two sizes: Size One fits Australian 8-12 Size Two fits Australian 14-18 ---------------------------------------

name: Full Length - Convertible Dress
description:
Wrap and twist this Convertible Dress into over 50 different styles! The perfect Bridesmaid Dress! Your girls can either uniform their wrap style or each bridesmaid can wear the gown in a different style to suit their figure. The full circle skirt makes this dress suitable for every body shape. Straight hips, Curvy bottoms even Maternity. It doesn't stick to your "self-conscious bits" it simply glides off your hips. The fabric is a Meryl Microfiber.. it is simply divine and so comfortable to wear. Containing no polyester, our dresses don't have that tacky 'swimwear' shine. Our fabric breathes and flows beautifully. Proudly made in Australia with love and care. Wrap your Convertible Dress into over 50 styles! Click Here to follow easy step by step instructions and video tutorials to find out how to wrap your convertible dress. Want more wrap ideas? Add some BLING and you are ready for the ballroom! Available in 16 different colours. Click here to View the Colour Range or, to Request a Fabric Sample. name: A-line Convertible Dress
description:
This gorgeous A-Line Convertible Dress is the perfect Maxi dress for the weekend. The difference between this Dress and our Full Length Gown is the skirt. The Aline shape has much less fabric than our Full Length Gowns, making them super light and lovely to wear in hot weather. They are also shorter than our Gowns - allowing you to wear flat sandals. Proudly made in Australia from a super soft fabric that you will totally fall in love with. Available in Three sizes: Size One fits Australian 8-12 Size Two fits Australian 14-18 Size Three fits Australian 20-24 Wrap your Convertible Dress into over 50 styles! Click Here to follow easy step by step instructions and video tutorials. Want more style options? Add some BLING and transform your look from casual to formal in an instant. ---------------------------------------

name: "Swing" Convertible Top
description:
This perfect little Convertible Top not only twists and wraps into over 50 different styles.. The bottom of this Swing Top is a full circle which looks like a cute little frill at the bottom of the shirt. It's the PERFECT top to hide all your...well "Self Conscious Bits". Wear it with Leggings or your favorite pair of skinny jeans. This top is definitely my favorite top in my wardrobe right now! Size Two and Three are longer than the Size One Convertible Top shown in these photo's. name: Slim Fit - Convertible Dress
description:
This dress is perfect to take travelling with you when you don't know what to wear! Twist and Wrap this convertible dress into more than 50 styles. You can wear it knee length or as a super short mini! The "no shine" fabric makes it truely convertible: Pop on a pair of summer sandals and its perfect for a casual lunch with the girls OR Wear it with heals and add a bit of Bling and BOOM! Its a super sexy Cocktail Dress! Roll it up and stick it in an overnight bag... and just hang it up when you get there. No ironing needed! Want a super sexy dress that will smooth out those self-conscious bits? Check out our amazing FORM FIT dress. Made in Australia from Fabric that feels so smooth and lovely on your skin you will never want to take it off! Wrap your Convertible Dress into over 50 styles! Click Here to follow easy step by step instructions and video tutorials. Available in 16 different colours. Click here to View the Colour Range or, to Request a Fabric Sample. name: FORM FIT - Convertible Dress
description:
Got 'lady lumps' but want to wear a sexy cocktail dress? Forget wearing 'Shape Wear' under your dress...

this dress IS the Shape Wear!

 Wear a tight dress with complete confidence.. this dress gives you a flatter tummy and smaller butt! SERIOUSLY!! The skirt of this FORM FIT dress is nearly 5 times thicker than the top sashes... but with a two way stretch! So, its thick enough to hold in your lumps and bumps, but stretchy enough you can comfortably move. Wear the skirt high under your breasts for a mini skirt look OR low on your hips, for a below knee length and plunging neckline that is sure to turn heads! Want more style options? Add some BLING and transform your look in an instant! The FORM FIT Convertible Dress is available in Black or White Form Fit skirt.. and 16 different colours for the ties at the top.View the Colour Range or Request a Fabric Sample. Available in Two sizes: Size One fits Australian 6-10 Size Two fits Australian 12-14 --------------------------------------- We have more stock arriving in 4 weeks! To pre-order yours now CLICK HERE.

name: Bridal Gown with Train - Convertible Dress
description: With Lucy and Loo's Convertible Bridal Gown, you can twist and wrap your dress into any style you want.. Wear it as a Strapless gown, a one shoulder wedding gown, Cap sleeve, Low Back or Halter wedding dress.. your options are almost unlimited. This Convertible dress is a classic and elegant wedding gown, complete with Bridal Train. It's simple design makes it the perfect Beach Wedding Dress, or if you are after a more formal look, simply add some Bling and change the look completely - to a gorgeous high fashion Wedding Gown. Made in Australia from fabric so soft, you will never want to take it off! This Wedding Gown is available in stunning White or classic Ivory. CLICK HERE to Request a Fabric Sample.. Available in Three sizes: Size One fits Australian 8-12 Size Two fits Australian 14-18 Size Three fits Australian 20-24 --------------------------------------- Made to order in as little as 4 weeks. To pre-order yours now CLICK HERE.

name: "Star" Diamante Rings - Silver PAIR
description: Want to add some BLING to your dress? Transform your look in an instant with this pair of "Star" Diamante rings. Pull the strap of your Lucy and Loo Convertible Dress or Top through the ring. You can position the ring high or low, instantly create a Cap Sleeve look or add the ring to the strap at your waist. Please note, these rings will not fit 2 straps through the ring. These rings are sold in a PAIR Normal RRP is $20 Shipping is free when purchased with a dress.

name: "Frost" Diamante Ring - Black
description: Want to add some BLING to your dress? This colour matches perfectly with black patent leather shoes! As if 50 different styles weren't enough... this gorgeous diamante ring will completely transform your look again and again! Save on necklaces.. buy this instead! The diamante's on the ring shimmer with light just like real diamonds to make you look expensive and classy! These versatile rings can be worn with: - One strap style with both straps through the ring - Halter style the ring horizontal - Cross over back for a sexy looking back - Add to any style as an addition to the waist wrap - Two Straps or Cap Sleeve Buy Two, slip straps through each ring Shipping is free when purchased with a dress. Price listed is for one ring.

name: Pearl and Diamante Brooch
description: Want to add some BLING to your dress? As if 50 different styles weren't enough... this gorgeous brooch will completely transform your look again and again! The pearls and diamantes on this brooch add an element of class to your look. No pins! There are no pins on this broach. The unique design is almost like a giant clip-on ear ring. It will safely secure on your dress, without puncturing the fabric. These versatile broach can be worn with: - One strap style with both straps through the ring - Low V for a gorgeous plunging neckline - Add to any style as an addition to the waist wrap Shipping is free when purchased with a dress. Also available in Black Pearl.

name: Hematite Rings - Pair
description:
Stock Clearance! 15% off this week only!

Transform your Lucy and Loo Convertible Dress in an instant with these Hematite Rings. Did you know? Hematite is a natural mineral that isn't molded into a ring - it is carved. Used commonly in Feng Shui, it is said to have a very strong grounding energy; brings you optimism, balance and courage; as well as a cooling and calming effect on the mind. Hematite Rings are dark grey in colour and super shiny. Please note: If you drop them, they are likely to break.

name: Bandeau - Seamless cover for a strapless bra
description:
Want to wear a bra with your convertible dress? Cover it seamlessly with a Bandeau! Made from the same fabric as your Lucy and Loo dress, it will match perfectly for a seamless look. No one will know its there! OR mix it up with a different colour and transform your dress into a two tone. With a Bandeau, you can wear a Strapless Bra, Halter or Cross Over. Watch the video tutorial below for instructions on how to wrap with a Bra. Did you know.. you can even wear it as a mini skirt?! Available in 16 different colours. Click here to View the Colour Range or, to Request a Fabric Sample. name: Flower Girl Sash
description: Match your little princess to the exact fabric and colour of the Bridesmaid Dresses with this gorgeous Sash. Add a broach or ring to your sash for a little sparkle. View the colour range here. Flower Girl dress also avaliable. Please Contact Us for info.

name: Bow Ties
description:
Match your bridal party with these GORGEOUSBow Ties! 

They are made from the same fabric as your Lucy and Loo Convertible Dress. 

The Page Boy Bow Ties are kid sizes (around 7cm's width) and are already tied - attached to either White or Black Elastic (Depending on what colour shirt your gorgeous little man will be wearing). 

Yes.. we can make these bow ties for the big boys too. They are around 15cm's in width and $25!

options.name: Page Boy - Match my Dress Colour
Mens Size - Match my Dress Colour

name: Pocket Squares
description:
Match your man with your dress.... or co-ordinate the whole Bridal Party!

The Pocket Squares are a handkerchief in the exact fabric as your dress.

Folding is super simple! We include easy step-by-step instructions on how to fold your pocket square with every purchase. 

The instructions are so easy to follow, even your man can do it!

name: Nudi Bra - The real backless bra!
description: The backless and strapless Nudi-Bra by 'Secret Weapons' is the BEST bra to wear under your Lucy and Loo Convertible Dress. This Ultra Light, Self-adhesive bra is backless and strapless. Wearing the Nudi-Bra means you get support - without worrying about your conventional bra strap showing. So you can enjoy wearing all of the gorgeous 'low back' wraps-styles. The cups give you a nice rounded bust shape and you don't have to worry of its a cold day (If you get my drift!) They have a soft fabric outer cover (which wont grip on Lucy and Loo fabric) and are super sticky inside - so they won't fall off you, even on the hottest of days. Apply one cup at a time and use the clear plastic clasp in the center to bring your 'girls' together and create some cleavage. A, B, C and D cup sizes are available in both Black and Skin colour. Designed for multiple use, simply wash with mild detergent and air dry. Once dry, the clever adhesive becomes super sticky again! NOTE: We are out of stock on this item right now. Contact us for the ETA!

name: Invisilifts - AMAZING adhesive breast lift!
description: Want an invisible breast lift without the need for a bra? Lift them up INCHES with these Secret Weapons. (Loo's favorite!) Invisilifts by Secret Weapons are invisible, clear, self-adhesive miracle workers that lift your breasts up to 5cm to give you the ultimate gravity-defying support! Our Inivisilifts are hypoallergenic, transparent, waterproof and applied to the top of the breast rather than underneath. Just stick on your Invisilifts and you are ready to impress! Invisilifts can be trimmed to size from A cup to D cup, or left whole for maximum breast lift. But lift like this doesn’t come easy, so Invisilifts are for one use only! And because we know you’ll love them, there are 5 adhesive Invisilifts included in every pack. And the Best Part? Invisilifts™ go unnoticed to ensure you won’t! For Step-by-step instructions on how to use your Invisilifts, Click Here.

name: Gel Sole Cussions - Big event? You need these!
description:
Stock Clearance! 50% off!

Want to wear your favorite heels but can’t bear the pain? Twinkle Toes Gel Cushions from Secret Weapons are superior super soft, 100% silicone, giving you all day comfort and support! The perfect solution to that burning sensation in the balls of your feet, our Twinkle Toes Gel Cushions are the best on the market. Simply place our crystal clear Twinkle Toes Gel Cushions into your shoes, smooth side down and strut your stuff! Only 1 pair left! Normally $9.95 a pair.
